scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:mobile" "npm run dev:shared"
scripts.lint: npm run lint:web && npm run lint:mobile
scripts.lint:mobile: cd mobile && npm run lint || true
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:web && npm run type-check:shared
scripts.clean: npm run clean:shared && npm run clean:web
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd shared && npm install && cd ../web && npm install && cd ../mobile && npm install
